basics.name: Pradeep Kumar G
basics.label: Senior Software Developer
basics.summary: I'm a Senior Software Engineer specializing in backend development at UnitedHealth Group. Microservices & bottlenecks really pique my curiosity !
summaryLong: I'm a Senior Software Engineer with over 3 years of experience, and I love coding, especially when it involves tackling complex problems and collaborating with teams. I've led and contributed to engineering efforts that include, designing MarTech pipeline to outreach 1.5M+ members, migrating of 3+ Billion records from on-prem to cloud, etc.
I like to keep my code and design, simple and stupid. Whether it's diving into trade-off discussions or inculcating new features, I aim to deliver high quality and practical solutions.

education.area: Electronics and Communication Engineering (Minor in Computer Science)
